survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers about their experience with payment platforms, focusing on ease of use, transaction speed, fees, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: Which payment platform do you primarily use for freelance work?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common platforms. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with radio buttons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which payment platform do you primarily use for freelance work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the transaction speed of your primary payment platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the transaction speed of your primary payment platform?

questions.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using your primary payment platform?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections if applicable. Include an 'Other' option for unique frustrations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using your primary payment platform?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience delays in receiving payments through your primary platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale for clarity. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you experience delays in receiving payments through your primary platform?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added to your primary payment platform?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit the response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see added to your primary payment platform?
